casebody.data:
INTERSAL, INC.
v.
HAMILTON, et al. 115A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 8, 2018 David H. Harris, Jr., Attorney at Law, Durham, for Intersal, Inc. Brian Rabinovitz, Olga Vysotskaya de Brito, Charles G. Whitehead, Special Deputy Attorney Generals, Amar Majmundar, Senior Deputy Attorney General, for North Carolina Department of Natural and Cultural Resources, et al. Jeffrey A. Doyle, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Joshua D. Neighbors, Attorney at Law, for Friends of Queen Anne's Revenge (Non-Profit Corporation).

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of November 2018 by Defendants to Stay Briefing:

*739"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of November 2018."
